update.description:
Per Eric Krotkov’s request @faller and I have been working on improving the visual textures for the VRC arenas.

These changes are split into pull-requests across three repositories, please merge at the same time:

* #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/26/new-vrc-textures/diff

* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/435/new-vrc-textures/diff

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/205/new-vrc-textures/diff

### Changelist: ###

* added texture to mud

* improved grass texture in manipulation and driving tasks

* added randomized texture to rubble

* changed texture sizes in heightmaps to improve resolution (also reduces increased parallax, the remaining parallax needs to be fixed by fixing heightmap or using a trimesh instead, see [gazebo issue 572](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/572/vrc-heightmap-problems))

* replaced grass texture in walking task heightmap

* added structured texture to valve, spigot, and hose coupling (color can be changed via material script) - not perfect but best we could do with the limited amount of time we have

* removed light from manipulation area in task3 to be able to see texture on objects properly

* turned off lighting for house_1 model as global lighting in driving task made it appear way too bright

* added brick texture to starting pen

* added brick wall between manipulation area and gas station

* changed initial camera view in vrc tasks to have better overview

### Pictures of new arenas:###

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task1.png

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task2_view0.png

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task2_view1.png

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task3_view0.png

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task3_view1.png

Everyone please feel free to give feedback / issue (reasonable) concerns if some change doesn’t work for your team or if you have a change yourself you want to contribute (I’ll give you write permissions to commit to the fork).

Thanks to Maurice (MIT) for collaborating and to Max (JPL) for providing feedback.

-Thomas
update.title: New VRC Textures

content.raw:
Thanks Steve. I'll check your copy later today when I'm back at the lab.
The drcsim pull-request will be the most difficult to merge I think. ;) I already had my fun time trying to merge the current default in a few days ago.
content.html: Thanks Steve. I'll check your copy later today when I'm back at the lab. The drcsim pull-request will be the most difficult to merge I think. ;) I already had my fun time trying to merge the current default in a few days ago.

content.raw:
Thomas, sorry for the delay on these pull requests. I was just testing this, and I think it will be hard to merge. It's easy to mess up merges from forks with Bitbucket. The issue is that this pull request will create multiple heads if it's merged. Also, it appears that your fork already has multiple heads, due to the following commit.
~~~
changeset:   7622:0029e32a48e6
parent:      7619:092e6ddb21ee
user:        faller
date:        Wed Apr 10 06:00:22 2013 -0400
summary:     making grass brigher and greener
~~~
I made pull request #492 by copying your changes, and I think it will merge easier. Please approve it if it matches your intentions.
content.html:
Thomas, sorry for the delay on these pull requests. I was just testing this, and I think it will be hard to merge. It's easy to mess up merges from forks with Bitbucket. The issue is that this pull request will create multiple heads if it's merged. Also, it appears that your fork already has multiple heads, due to the following commit.

changeset:   7622:0029e32a48e6
parent:      7619:092e6ddb21ee
user:        faller
date:        Wed Apr 10 06:00:22 2013 -0400
summary:     making grass brigher and greener

I made pull request #492 by copying your changes, and I think it will merge easier. Please approve it if it matches your intentions.

content.raw: Thanks for this pull-request. We'll get to integrating it later this week, early next week. Right now we are focusing on wrapping up features required for qualifications.
content.html: Thanks for this pull-request. We'll get to integrating it later this week, early next week. Right now we are focusing on wrapping up features required for qualifications.

update.title: New VRC Textures

content.raw: Not sure where the ``2x4x1_box.dae`` should go ... right now it's in ``media/materials/textures`` as it's the only "reasonable" directly that gets installed right now (it's only needed for proper texture mapping for the 2 by 4 rubble pieces).
content.html: Not sure where the 2x4x1_box.dae should go ... right now it's in media/materials/textures as it's the only "reasonable" directly that gets installed right now (it's only needed for proper texture mapping for the 2 by 4 rubble pieces).

update.description:
Per Erik Krotkov’s request @faller and I have been working on improving the visual textures for the VRC arenas.

These changes are split into pull-requests across three repositories, please merge at the same time:

* <gazebo_models pr link>

* <gazebo pr link>

* <drcsim pr link>

### Changelist: ###

* added texture to mud

* improved grass texture in manipulation and driving tasks

* added randomized texture to rubble

* changed texture sizes in heightmaps to improve resolution (also reduces increased parallax, the remaining parallax needs to be fixed by fixing heightmap or using a trimesh instead, see [gazebo issue 572](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/572/vrc-heightmap-problems))

* replaced grass texture in walking task heightmap

* added structured texture to valve, spigot, and hose coupling (color can be changed via material script) - not perfect but best we could do with the limited amount of time we have

* removed light from manipulation area in task3 to be able to see texture on objects properly

* turned off lighting for house_1 model as global lighting in driving task made it appear way too bright

* added brick texture to starting pen

* added brick wall between manipulation area and gas station

* changed initial camera view in vrc tasks to have better overview

### Pictures of new arenas:###

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task1.png

* http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/new_vrc_arenas/new_vrc_task2_view0.png
